title: Change Janna's E bonus to Adaptive Force.
body: Hey. Since you're now using Adaptive Force in champion kits (Yuumi) can you update Janna to use it as well? It always feels really bad when using her E on a mage and losing out on a big portion of the spell's power. :(

The problem is that in team fights when it comes to picking who to shield the correct answer is **always** "the ranged marksman dps". Which is a little...bland.

No, the shield is still good to use on anyone. Why use it on the ad when they are so behind? Use it on your fed carry instead. 


If the bonus ad was never there in the first place, this post wouldn't have been created. Now that you've added a conditional to the spell, people will always complain. 


It's like old Irelia E. People complained about getting cc'd from that ability no matter what. What if it was a just plain stun instead of a slow or stun? Nobody would complain. Now because people have to play around conditionals, they feel as if they lose out on more, when really, they don't play around their or their opponents abilities.

Dude do you realise that a fully maxed E gives an entire {{item:1038}} , without counting the AP Ratio and Janna always building {{item:3504}}. Considering that she keeps her Ult for disengage/desperate situations, the only way to proc Ardent reliably and instantly is through her E, which further encourages her to use it more on the ADC than a Mage.

If the bonus AD was never added she would have more power elsewhere. If old Irelia E stunned instead of conditionally stunning people, she would have been significantly nerfed. Conditional power always plays a significant role in a champions power level, most of the times resulting in the champion being balanced around them being able to trigger it reliably, especially when it has a significant impact.

Back to the topic, denying an ADC this combo {{item:1038}} {{item:3504}} will lead to a huge drop in their DPS. Other AD Divers may or may not be as good targets to shield, but outside of them, the stats offered will be wasted. Tho, if it gave adaptive power, I agree that it should be nerfed.
